headline: Assessing Baker Hughes (BKR) Valuation After New AI Data Center Turbine Order
summary: Baker Hughes (BKR) has drawn fresh attention after Twenty20 Energy awarded it a contract for 10 Frame 5 gas turbines for data center projects in Georgia and Texas, tied to growing AI power needs. See our latest analysis for Baker Hughes. The Twenty20 Energy order lands while Baker Hughes’ 1 month share price return of 27.74% and year to date gain of 29.93% suggest building momentum, alongside a 5 year total shareholder return of 193.13% that points to strong compounding over time.
